Medani True Strike.name: Medani True Strike
Medani True Strike.flavor: Your Mark of Detection flares, sending out darts of energy to hunt down hidden foes and reveal their locations.
keywords: Ranged 10  Effect: You can see invisible creatures within 10 squares of you and within your line of sight until you hit or miss with this power.  Target: One creature  Attack: Charisma or Wisdom + 4 vs. Reflex. The attack ignores any cover and any concealment if the target is within 10 squares of you.  Hit: 2d10 + Charisma or Wisdom modifier.
Medani True Strike.effect: You can see invisible creatures within 10 squares of you and within your line of sight until you hit or miss with this power.
Medani True Strike.attack: Charisma or Wisdom + 4 vs. Reflex. The attack ignores any cover and any concealment if the target is within 10 squares of you.

Medani Foretelling.name: Medani Foretelling
Medani Foretelling.flavor: The power of your dragon mark allows you to take a quick glance into the future to help you decide what to do.
keywords: Personal   Effect: You roll a d20. If you attack during this turn, you can choose to use this roll as the first attack roll of the attack.
Medani Foretelling.effect: You roll a d20. If you attack during this turn, you can choose to use this roll as the first attack roll of the attack.

Disruptive Premonition.name: Disruptive Premonition
Disruptive Premonition.flavor: Before your enemy can strike, you let loose a debilitating sting that inhibits its defenses and ability to attack.
Disruptive Premonition.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you hits or misses you or an ally
Disruptive Premonition.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma or Wisdom modifier damage, and the target takes a -4 penalty to attack rolls against you (save ends).
Disruptive Premonition.effect: The target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
